Blog.post: I just got a bad news from Myy. His friend got dead, she's a little and cute girl, Specialy she is going to marry with her bf soon.

YA,This urlLink my new site grand opening, WOW it's look so cute but i think i will make something more0 Kengelovemyy is me and my bf site, It show about our trip around thailand. See, Do you know my country? it's so beautiful and amazing. i want to take my close friend to there together!!!!
I have to wake up at 6.30 everyday, OMG i hate it!!!
Weary all week. Yes, haven't blogged much lately , but things are very busy.
Wake up at 11.00, I so tried. Last night MYY and I saw 'I-robot' and I thought it was good.
I sware , will not get too drunk but i cann't!! This's Friday night i plan to go to see 'I-robot' tonight and back to work at home. My friend call me...
Really busy. I know I haven't been around as often as I used too.
Tonight after work, dinner with Aui at' Yum Sab'
What's that, This's my holiday that i have to working!!!

Happy birthday to GAME, my younger brother is 11 years old today. I wanna buy a new gameboy SP-advance for him but my sis disagree. Because his grade is not better than, i think so but so sorry to him :( WOW i have a good idea, i will get a new game for him and i will tell my sis that is mine.;) and i wish he will make a good grade for the next exam. Today i got pain my head very much, i don't know why it was!!! T_T

The last friday i went to the big party, Because my 5 colleague were resign from my ex company. It began about 9.00pm at Deep on Khowsan road. My friend went to join with us about 20 people but only 3 still work at GMM. HAHAHAHA . I was happy and fun coz i have lot of close friend in there.and then i got too drunk. I can't remember how did i back but can remember a liitle to fall from upstaias 2 times.(OMG) It make me hurt all the next week.:(
Just bought and listened to new album 'Smallroom 004'.

I went to see "19". It's Japanese film Director is actor, i can't remember actor's name.It almost a quite film, about Japanese teen have nice and bad experience together. I think it was interesting but my bf sleep on the file run!!!! cool!!! Today i'm not go to office because i so tried and want to sleep more.... but i have to wake up to work at 9.00 !!!! Afternoon i had lunch with Myy and Keth (myy's colleager) at 'Swiss Cafe' on Silom road, and then i went to see my friend who i went to samed on last week. I had updated a new news from my gang about someone get to 'GIG', It's so funny!!! but i have to run at now.....

urlLink I just back from Samed . It's a small island in Thailand's eastern, have a nice and white sand, clean and clear. You can go to there a few time from Bangkok. I get to Samed on Sat's noon, It so hot but funny and happy, with my ex colleager and my bf, about 20 peoples, WOW!!! big gang!! Fullmoon Party on SAT's night, it very nice and relax. i love party!!
